import React, {Fragment, useContext} from 'react' import {Bars3Icon, PlusSmallIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import {MagnifyingGlassIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; import {Menu, Transition} from "@headlessui/react"; import {UserContext} from "../context/UserContext"; export const DashTopbar = ({classNames, setMobileMenuOpen, userNavigation}) => { const {user} = useContext(UserContext) return (
{/* Profile dropdown */}
